goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
page_content:
**Gender Related Laws and Policies in Ghana**

- Commission on Human Rights and Administrative Justice Act, 1993 (Act 456)

- Children’s Amendment Act, 2016 (Act 937)

- Domestic Violence Act, 2007 (Act 732)

- Intestate Succession Law, 1985 (PNDC III)

- Labour Act, 2003 (Act 651)

- National Gender Policy, 2015

- National Housing Policy, 2015

-  Rent Control Act, 1986 (PNDC Law 138)
